result.title: April Hack 101 + 800$ + Cool Tshirts + Awesome Problem Set
result.content:
Hi Codeforces !!!

I am glad to announce HackerRank 101 Hack â€” 36th Edition. The contest will be held on 16:30 UTC Wednesday, April 20 2016. Contestants will be given 5 problems and 2 hours to solve them. You can sign up for the contest here.The prizes for this contest are:

First Place: $300 Amazon Gift Card
Second Place: $200 Amazon Gift Card
Third Place: $100 Amazon Gift Card
Fourth Place: $50 Amazon Gift Card
Fifth Place: $50 Amazon Gift Card

Coders ranked 6-20: HackerRank T-shirt

This contest is rated for all users.

101 Hack problem set is prepared by me (_shil) and ma5termind is tested by wanbo. I would like to thank HackerRank for helping us hosting and preparing this round.

I am sure that everyone will find this round interesting and challenging. Each problem will be starring Shil and you have to help him solving some simple but interesting tasks.

Hope to see you participating.

Good Luck & Have Fun
